item.title: Need help with screenshots
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

How to add pictures to your topic:
Step 1: Take a screenshot with the button “Prt Scrn” somewhere on your keyboard.
Step 2: Open a program such as paint and press Ctrl V or right click and paste.
Step 3: Save your picture you took somewhere on your computer
Step 4: Go to http://www.imageshack.us and click browse, find your file and double click on it.
Step 5: Upload the picture and wait till its done loading
Step 6: Now its done with loading and you will see some links, just take the normal link or the normal link with IMG tags.
Step 7: Post it on the Forums

Read full topic
